bio: Blowkade is one weird Yo-kai. Nobody knows why he puts his all into blocking people's paths.

soultimate.name: Barricade Block
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases own Defense by 350% for 30 seconds
soultimate.description: Defense greatly increased, and foes focus on you.

skill.effect: No longer be pushed around by foes' attacks.
skill.name: Prickly Customer

name: Blowkade
